headline: Jim Cramer on Albemarle: “Don’t Know Where This One’s Coming From”
summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) is one of the top 10 S&P 500 winners of the day that Jim Cramer highlighted. The stock was discussed by Cramer during the episode, and the Mad Money host said: “Next is Albemarle. This is a chemical company that produces lithium. I honestly don’t know where this one’s coming from. We […]
